title: Is We Dumb? | Spine. Creamer. Hummer. Fake ID.
description:
Sending an unknown white powder through the hospital bank-tube system is all fun and games until you come back to work and the FBI is there. Let's talk about that, complaining about velcro straps on shoes, asking your mom for permission to masturbate, calling the cops to get your fake ID back, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/AiEFRg6R2Hc
